welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kurume, Japan! Known for its beautiful traditional gardens and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore the charm of our city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: 大昌園本店
restaurants.description: 大昌園本店 is a bbq joint located in 久留米市.
restaurants.address: 六ツ門町14-13, 久留米市, 福岡県, 830-0031

restaurants.name: Sushiro (スシロー 久留米通町店)
restaurants.description: Sushiro (スシロー 久留米通町店) is a sushi restaurant located in 久留米市.

restaurants.name: Tenya (てん屋)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Fukuoka Airport's main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used primarily for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
